entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 04:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
